name: Kate

topics.response_text: Hi, what can I do for you?
You saw our front sign, didn't you? This is where all the beautiful signs of the Strip become a reality.
Check out the back of the shop, he's usually working there.
He's the reason the Strip shines like a star at night. Mike's imagined and built every sign, billboard and light you'll see around here.

topics.topic_text: How long have you worked here?
topics.response_text: I've been here over a year now. Though I'm not one to get tied for long.

topics.topic_text: Tell me again about Michael Angelo.
topics.response_text: He's the reason the Strip shines like a star at night. Mike's imagined and built every sign, billboard and light you'll see around here.

description:
Kathleen 'Kate' O'Brien is a 24 year-old Caucasian Female.

A young woman working as Michael Angelo's assistant in his neon sign workshop on the New Vegas Strip. Kate has nimble fingers and an eye for color, helping to craft the dazzling lights that illuminate the casino district. Despite her skills, she appears restless and often gazes toward the horizon, clearly yearning for adventures beyond the neon glow.

Kathleen 'Kate' O'Brien's Personality: Restless yet dedicated, Kate has a curious spirit and an independent streak. She's skilled with her hands but dreams of seeing the wider wasteland. She's friendly but not overly trusting, having learned to be cautious in the harsh Mojave environment. She values freedom and exploration over settling down in one place.

Kathleen 'Kate' O'Brien's Backstory: Born in a small settlement near the Colorado River, Kate showed an early talent for repairing and creating things with her hands. After her settlement was attacked by raiders when she was 16, she wandered the Mojave for several years, taking odd jobs and learning about electronics and sign-making from various traders. She eventually made her way to New Vegas and was hired by Michael Angelo two years ago, impressed by her natural talent with neon and electrical work. While she appreciates the steady work and relative safety of the Strip, she feels increasingly confined and dreams of exploring the uncharted territories of the wasteland.
